word_mean: ［拉］妄想：一种被顽固坚持的不真实的有关外界的信念，尽管有无可辩驳的证据证明正好相反
这种信念是其他人类文化或次文化所不接受的。参见illusion

sentence.Network_en: I was under the delusion that he intended to marry me.
He is under the delusion that he is Napoleon.
sentence.Network_cn: 他患了妄想症,认为自己是拿破仑.

sentence.Network_en: He is under a delusion in this matter.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 妄想症的患者，除了因妄想 (delusion) 主题及有关事物影响外，情感性障碍并不明显，一般功能无显着受损，行为亦无明显奇特怪异 (b…

大学英语精读单词表(第六册) - 豆丁网 ... coarse a. 粗糙的， 粗鄙的 delusion n. 欺骗； 幻觉； 迷惑 grandeur n. 庄严， 伟大.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... deluge 洪水 delusion 幻想 demand 要求.

list.abs: ...收藏查看科塔尔综合征科塔尔综合征（Cotard syndrome） ：以虚无妄想（nihilistic delusion）和否定妄想 （delusion of negation）为核心症状患者主要是认为自身躯体和内部器官发生了变化.

jx.jx_en_mean: a false impression of one's own importance

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'act of deluding or of being deluded'): from late Latin delusio(n-), from the verb deludere (see delude)

entry.def: A delusion is a false idea.

example.ex: I was under the delusion that he intended to marry me.

entry.def: Delusion is the state of believing things that are not true.

example.ex: This was not optimism, it was delusion.

entry.def: If someone has delusions of grandeur, they think and behave as if they are much more important or powerful than they really are.

example.ex: He suggested that we suffer delusions of grandeur as a football nation.
example.tran: 他暗示我们妄自尊大地以为自己是个足球民族。

example.ex: ...mansions built by men with delusions of grandeur.
example.tran: 自以为是的人建造的豪宅

means.word_mean: 1. (psychology) an erroneous belief that is held in the face of evidence to the contrary
2. a mistaken or unfounded opinion or idea;

sentences.sentence: "his dreams of vast wealth are a hallucination"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of deluding; deception by creating illusory ideas

auth_sentence.content: That still didn't make that particular delusion true.
auth_sentence.res_content: That still didn't make that particular delusion true.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That still didn't make that particular delusion true.

auth_sentence.content: I can't argue against such delusion and stubbornness.
auth_sentence.res_content: I can't argue against such delusion and stubbornness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I can't argue against such delusion and stubbornness.

auth_sentence.content: Just look at his book on the God Delusion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just look at his book on the God Delusion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just look at his book on the God Delusion.

means.word_mean: 谬见; 错觉; 妄想

sentences.en: He is under the delusion that he is Napoleon.
sentences.cn: 他患了妄想症, 认为自己是拿破仑。

jushi.english: I think you have suffered from delusion.
She is suffering from the delusion that he will marry her.
jushi.chinese: 她错误地以为他会娶她，并受此幻念的折磨。
